overview: Hanna and her Pilates instructor are at it again. If her husband won't fuck her, she will go find a big dicked stud who will. Sara is a typical houswife... until her husband leaves. Her dominant inner slut emerges in a sexual frenzy. Julia is tired of her lame ass husband. When he leaves for work she wastes no time in getting some extra marital action in the bedroom. While on vacation together, Bridgette and Carmel decide to spice things up by switching husbands for the night. Aletta's husband has been in jail for a long time. To make it up to her, he decides to let Aletta fuck the guard on her next visit.
title: Real Wife Stories 5
